snippet: Venezuelan authorities on Monday welcomed home a painting by the artist Henri Matisse more than a decade after it had disappeared from a Caracas museum.
abstract: Venezuelan authorities welcome home painting by artist Henri Matisse more than a decade after it disappeared from Contemporary Art Museum of Caracas; painting was recovered in 2012 by federal agents in Miami when they arrested two people and charged them with trying to sell the artwork.
lead_paragraph: Venezuelan authorities on Monday welcomed home a painting by the artist Henri Matisse more than a decade after it had disappeared from a Caracas museum.
